      • newReply

        @Nonnull
protected static DhcpMessage newReply(@Nonnull
                           DhcpMessage request,
                           @Nonnull
                           MessageType type)
        Initializes a general DHCP reply message. Sets:
        • op=BOOTREPLY
        • htype, hlen, xid, flags, giaddr, chaddr like in request message
        • hops, secs to 0.
        • server hostname to the hostname appropriate for the interface the request was received on
        • the server identifier set to the address of the interface the request was received on
        Parameters:
        request -
        Returns:
        DhcpMessage

      • newReplyNak

        @Nonnull
protected static DhcpMessage newReplyNak(@Nonnull

        Utility: Constructs a new NAK reply.

protected static DhcpMessage newReplyAck(@Nonnull
